channel.title: Vundo.... you can guess the whole post lol
channel.description:
Ok, so a few questions, 1. When was the vundo virus made, 2. What does it do exactly? 3. Why doesn't every virus maker make the virus they make like vundo?(lol mouth full there...) Thats just some shit ive been wondering about while i try to rid my cousins computer of it.
I had the vundo virus once before I knew anything at all about computers, I remember trying for 2 weeks before I got rid of it. took me like 5 different fix programs, restored my windows files, used 3 unlockers, 2 anti virus programs and like 4 spy ware programs before I managed to kill it all the way. Now my cousin has gone and got it, so far I've cleaned it out of his registry, deleted the actual dll, and replaced all the infected system files like explorer.exe and his graphics files that for some unknown reason it decided to take over, and It still persists, I am sorta out of ideas here, the last thing we tried was a vundo fix program, after 9.5 hours of running, It said something about 2 viruses and shut off saying it failed or something...
hmm, as to the topic name, I am assuming every one who has had dealings with the vundo virus had as much trouble as I described, basically its hell...

item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

Whats the point in a virus that just destroys? I can see the point in a keylogger but other then that why make a virus?

Read full topic

item.title: Vundo.... you can guess the whole post lol
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“ninja nub, post:7, topic:206912”][quote author=cooper link=topic=272790.msg2238600#msg2238600 date=1211536624]
If this is the virus I think you are talking about [I have it, if it is that virus], it is known to make your fan more active, and your computer’s temperature will rise.
[/quote]

All computers will do that when they’re RAM usage is high. (Viruses use up a lot of your computer’s memory usage)[/quote]
Oh, I didn’t realize that viruses take up that much memory [most of my friends’ [who have asked me to disinfect their computers] computers have always been quiet].

Read full topic

If this is the virus I think you are talking about [I have it, if it is that virus], it is known to make your fan more active, and your computer’s temperature will rise.

All computers will do that when they’re RAM usage is high. (Viruses use up a lot of your computer’s memory usage)

item.title: Vundo.... you can guess the whole post lol
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

I always thought it did more because when i had it and even for my cousin now, its put itself in explorer.exe and explorer.exe runs with like 150-250 megs of ram while infected, normally it uses like 10 or less for me…

Read full topic
item.source: Vundo.... you can guess the whole post lol

item.title: Vundo.... you can guess the whole post lol
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

It found an exploit in your Java and that’s how you were effected. That is why some retards came to believe runescape was a virus. I had this virus before. What it did was pop-up little message saying “Your computer may have a virus”, and when you clicked it it led you to these fake anti-virus shit. It’s basically an adware scam.

Read full topic
item.source: Vundo.... you can guess the whole post lol

item.title: Vundo.... you can guess the whole post lol
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

its not undeleteable because I got it off my computer, but it took forever, so it just does something to Java? i always thought it was just like a keylogger of some sort…

Read full topic
